snippet: Most of the deaths from exposure to particulate matter, a component of air pollution, occur in India and China.
abstract: Most of the deaths from exposure to particulate matter, a component of air pollution, occur in India and China.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — “Air pollution has worsened markedly in Asian cities in recent years and presents a growing threat to human health, according to experts at a conference that began on Wednesday,” Bettina Wassener wrote in The New York Times.

headline.main: Asian Cities’ Air Quality Getting Worse, Experts Warn
